successes.title: The Bard's Tale IV
successes.description: From the creators of Wasteland 2 and Torment comes the long awaited sequel to the Bard's Tale trilogy. Thank you for making this game a reality. The bard is back!

Pledges.description: Show your support for The Bard's Tale IV! This reward level comes with a Backer Forum Badge you can boast on our message boards, and our thanks.
THE BARD'S TALE IV as a digital download for Windows/Mac/Linux, available from Steam or DRM-free from GOG.com. Also comes with Digital Game Manual and Backer Forum Badge.
THE BARD'S TALE IV as a digital download for Windows/Mac/Linux, available from Steam or DRM-free from GOG.com. Also comes with Digital Game Manual and Backer Forum Badge.
DOWNLOADABLE COPY - THE BARD'S TALE IV
THE BARD'S TALE IV as a digital download for Windows/Mac/Linux, available from Steam or DRM-free from GOG.com. Also comes with Digital Game Manual and Backer Forum  Badge.

Have you landed your ship in the pirate's bay before? No worries, friend! If you've previously plundered from us, pick this reward tier for a digital copy of The Bard's Tale IV, Digital Game Manual, Backer Forum Badge, and an OFFICIAL FORGIVENESS LETTER from our CEO Brian Fargo expressing his forgiveness and pardoning your buccaneer ways.

Unleash your inner explorer! This reward tier comes with the Downloadable Copy - The Bard's Tale IV tier, and also includes a Digital Art Book and Digital Item and Weapons Guide to learn their secrets.

Get your Bardic history up to speed! Includes a Downloadable Copy of The Bard's Tale IV plus a NOVELLA 3-PACK covering the events and lore of The Bard's Tale I through III, plus a DIGITAL ART BOOK and DIGITAL WEAPONS & ITEMS GUIDEBOOK, a mini strategy guide revealing their secrets.

For the fan who wants it all, without the shelf space. This reward tier comes with The History of the Bard tier, plus a 3 PACK OF THE BARD'S TALE IV DIGITAL NOVELLAS, a PREMIUM DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE, a digital version of the game's ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK by Julie Fowlis, Mark Morgan, and Ged Grimes, DIGITAL ART BOOK, DIGITAL MAP, and DIGITAL HI-RES WALLPAPER PACK – all in an easy-to-download form.

What does one Bard's life matter? This all-digital reward tier lets you get your game on. Receive a digital copy of THE BARD'S TALE IV and TORMENT:TIDES OF NUMENERA upon its release, along with a digital version of the Torment Manual too.
For the old-school collector! This HIGH-QUALITY LP-STYLE BOX is based on the classic Bard's Tale box, and comes with an old-school Printed Game Manual.

For the fan who wants it all, and wants it early. Comes with the contents of the All Downloadable Superpack, plus enjoy BETA ACCESS to The Bard's Tale IV before the final version is released, and a DIGITAL SONGBOOK featuring written-out sheet music to play along to. Also show your support by entering your name in the BACKER CREDITS included in the game!

The Bard's having a really rough day! Not only does he have to endure all manner of Torment, he's stuck trekking through an entire Wasteland too. This tier comes with all rewards from The Tormented Bard, plus a digital copy of WASTELAND 2 including its upcoming GAME OF THE YEAR update, and its Digital Game Manual!

A HIGH-QUALITY PREMIUM COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOX. In addition to a larger box, this also comes with PRINTED GAME MANUAL, a CLOTH MAP of the game world, PRINTED ART BOOK, a CD version of the game's Original Soundtrack, Digital Songbook, Digital Strategy guide, both digital Novella 3-Packs, and Digital High-Res Wallpapers. Also includes your name in the BACKER CREDITS and BETA TEST Access, and digital versions of all included physical rewards!
